components.name: API Server
components.description: Handles incoming requests, manages application logic, and interacts with the database.

components.name: Database
components.description: Stores application data, user information, and configuration settings. Supports multiple database types like PostgreSQL and MySQL.

components.name: Docker Management
components.description: Manages Docker containers and orchestrates deployments using Docker Compose and Docker Swarm.

components.name: Frontend Dashboard
components.description: User interface for managing applications, viewing logs, and configuring settings.

data_flows.description: User actions in the dashboard trigger API calls to manage applications and retrieve data.
The API server queries and updates the database based on user requests and application logic.
The API server sends commands to the Docker Management component to deploy or manage containers.

trust_boundaries.name: User Data Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that separates user data from application logic and external services.

trust_boundaries.name: Deployment Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary that separates the management of application deployments from user interactions.
